p: The anthetic flowers were dissected under a Leica M80 stereomicroscope (Leica Biosystems Richmond, Inc., Wetzlar, Germany) and dehydrated in an ethanol dilution series before being critically point-dried with CO 2 and sputter-coated with gold (SCD-050 sputter coater, Bal-Tec AG, Balzers, Liechtenstein). Observations were carried out using a JEOL JSM 5800 LV scanning electron microscope (JEOL, Tokyo, Japan).
